summary: This is a brief email chain from October 2019 regarding scheduling a meeting for October 31, 2019, involving an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The subject references Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mark Epstein is referenced in the email subject line, indicating he is a topic of discussion for a scheduled meeting involving a federal prosecutor.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting Regarding Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for October 31, 2019, as referenced in the email chain. The subject line indicates the meeting concerns Mark Epstein.

events.title: Email Confirmation for Meeting
events.description: An email is sent confirming a meeting scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on Monday (implied to be October 28, 2019) at an unspecified location.

keyFacts: The email subject references Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he was a subject of interest or discussion for federal prosecutors in October 2019.

An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in scheduling a meeting, showing ongoing federal legal activity related to the Epstein case after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The correspondence shows planning for a meeting on October 31, 2019, specifically concerning Mark Epstein.
